verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> our <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> how <S%H117>majestic<s%> is your <S%H8034>name<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth,<s%> who has <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H1935>glory<s%> above the <S%H8064>heavens!<s%>

From the <S%H6310>lips<s%> of <S%H5768>babes<s%> and <S%H3243>infants<s%> you have <S%H3245>established<s%> <S%H5797>strength,<s%> because of your <S%H6887>adversaries,<s%> that you might <S%H7673>silence<s%> the <S%H341>enemy<s%> and the <S%H5358>avenger.<s%>
When I <S%H7200>consider<s%> your <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H676>fingers,<s%> the <S%H3394>moon<s%> and the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> which you have <S%H3559>ordained;<s%>
what is <S%H582>man,<s%> that you <S%H2142>think<s%> of <S%H1121>him?<s%> What is the son of <S%H120>man,<s%> that you care for <S%H6485>him?<s%>
For you have made him a <S%H4592>little<s%> <S%H2637>lower<s%> than <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5849>crowned<s%> him with <S%H3519>glory<s%> and <S%H3519>honor.<s%>
You make him <S%H4910>ruler<s%> over the <S%H4639>works<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands.<s%> You have <S%H7896>put<s%> all things under his <S%H7272>feet:<s%>
All <S%H6792>sheep<s%> and <S%H504>cattle,<s%> <S%H929>yes,<s%> and the animals of the <S%H7704>field,<s%>
The <S%H6833>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>sky,<s%> the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and whatever passes <S%H5674>through<s%> the <S%H734>paths<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas.<s%>
<S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> our <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> how <S%H117>majestic<s%> is your <S%H8034>name<s%> in all the <S%H776>earth!<s%>
